mapper.select:
SELECT TB_3.CH_PDCT_PD_CD , TB_3.FILT_CMU_NM , TB_3.FILT_CMU_EPL , LISTAGG(TB_5.SVPD_NM_KOR, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY TB_5.SVPD_NM_KOR) AS SVPD_NM_KOR FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ TB_1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT #{cntrNo} AS CNTR_NO , #{cntrSn} AS CNTR_SN , MAX(VST_DV_CD) AS VST_DV_CD , MAX(VST_NMN_N) AS VST_NMN_N FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TEMP.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND TEMP.VST_DUEDT = ( SELECT MIN(TEMP2.VST_DUEDT) AS VST_DUEDT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ TEMP2 WHERE 1=1 AND TEMP2.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TEMP2.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND TEMP2.VST_DUEDT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '31' /* suppressing 방지 */ AND TEMP2.WK_DT IS NULL AND TEMP2.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL ) ) TB_2 ON ( TB_1.CNTR_NO = TB_2.CNTR_NO AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = TB_2.CNTR_SN ) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_LVLH_CSTMW_FILT_BAS TB_3 ON ( TB_1.PDCT_PD_CD = TB_3.PDCT_PD_CD AND TB_1.SV_PD_CD = TB_3.SV_PD_CD AND TB_2.VST_DV_CD = TB_3.VST_DV_CD AND LPAD(TB_2.VST_NMN_N,2,0) = TB_3.PRD_MM_VAL ) INNER JOIN (
) TB_5 ON ( TB_3.CH_PDCT_PD_CD = TB_5.SVPD_PD_CD ) WHERE 1=1 AND TB_1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND TB_1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY TB_3.CH_PDCT_PD_CD, TB_3.FILT_CMU_NM, TB_3.FILT_CMU_EPL ORDER BY TB_3.CH_PDCT_PD_CD, TB_3.FILT_CMU_NM, TB_3.FILT_CMU_EPL
